880760.name: Neon Valley: Revenge Demo
880760.description:
The government has won the cyberwar. Their grasp chokes the citizens of every country as oppression rules the world.

Then a group of hackers carved out an untraceable piece of the cyberspace and created the underground network known as Neon Valley. Since then, it has become a place where both the good and the bad coexist as the last of the free. And such places need a center, a hub, a city.

Welcome to The Mainframe, the city at the center of Neon Valley. A social hub where users can meet and greet. Take on gate challenges, unlock multipass and gain access to the various features of The Mainframe. From weapon testing to the planetarium and character customization! Explore The Mainframes alleyways, arena, practice range and hidden secrets.
880760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
